original_text: The throne had six steps, and the top of the throne was round behind: and there were stays on either side on the place of the seat, and two lions stood beside the stays.
korean_text: 그 보좌에는 여섯 층계가 있고 보좌 뒤에 둥근 머리가 있고 앉는 자리 양쪽에는 팔걸이가 있고 팔걸이 곁에는 사자가 하나씩 서 있으며

sentences.original_text: and the top of throne was round behind
and there were stays on either side
on the place of the seat
and two lions stood beside the stays
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 두 마리 사자가 받침대 옆에 서 있었다
